scripts.bundle: cat tmp/deps.js tmp/lib.js tmp/tags.js boot.js > public/app.js
scripts.bundle:watch: onchange tmp/deps.js tmp/lib.js tmp/tags.js -- npm run bundle
scripts.build: npm run deps && npm run lib && npm run tags && npm run bundle
scripts.watch: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run deps:watch' 'npm run lib:watch' 'npm run tags:watch' 'npm run bundle:watch'
scripts.pack: npm run build && cat tmp/deps.js tmp/lib.js tmp/tags.js > tmp/kor_gallery.min.js
